fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Energy, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Industrial policy, innovation, financial services and banking regulation, EU ETS phase iv (2021-30), Brexit, trade policy, regulation pertaining to environmental quality standards, resource efficiency, circular economy, waste, consumer protection, chemicals management (REACH, CLP), sustainable use of natural resources, raw materials, conflict minerals, occupational health and safety, transport of dangerous goods and products, food contact materials and construction.
membership:
Nickel Institute - https://www.nickelinstitute.org/ 
Cobalt Institute - https://www.cobaltinstitute.org/ 
Eurometaux (European non-ferrous metals association) - https://www.eurometaux.eu/ 
Zug Commodity Association - https://zugcommodity.ch/ 
Zurich Commodity Club - http://www.commodityclub.ch/ 
International Commodities & Derivatives Association - http://www.incoda.org/ 
European Risk Forum (ERF) - http://www.riskforum.eu/
goals__remit: To provide advisory and other services to clients in Europe, inter alia, in the field of Regulatory Compliance and European Affairs as well as participation in EU stakeholder engagement.
